author: szoerner
msg: Renamed due to new tool name "Apache Directory Studio"

author: knopp
msg: Added debugging information about markup container classes

author: mbo
msg: - Loosen the restrictions on the placement of extension elements, meaning
that the jdo implementation needs to do more checking.
- Update the version entry in the XML Schema file to 2.1 and rename the
xsd files accordingly: jdo_2_1.xsd, orm_2_1.xsd and jdoquery_2_1.xsd.

author: rickhall
msg: Tried to improve Felix' shutdown sequence, which was confusing and perhaps
not altogether correct. Now all shutdowns occur via calling stop() on the
system bundle and Felix stops the system bundle now in a similar fashion
as normal bundles to ensure that proper events are fired.

author: chamikara
msg: Merger the previous commits to the branch, to the trunk
